attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish to register my protest at New Labours failure to Unfreeze / Index Link State Retirement Pensions re:the current BPIA(British Pensioners In Australia Inc). 

Having worked, and paid Tax, in the UK for 46 Yrs, and having served, an exemplary career in the British Armed Forces for 36 Yrs, one would have hoped for a little consideration and compassion.

Gordon Browns failure to consider the Basic Human Rights of some 520000 (as at Feb 07)Pensioners is the 'The Unkindest Cut of All'.

We can only hope and pray the ECHR;(European Court of Human Rights)will have greater compassion.

Your stance in this matter is wholly unjust, discriminatory and irrational, especially when many Aged Pensioners living abroad do have their Pensions increased annually.
